## BoundingBox.(constructor)

Creates a bounding box from the min point and the max point

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(minPoint: Vector3, maxPoint: Vector3);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  minPoint | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | Min point of the box |
|  maxPoint | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | Max point of the box |
